attributes.additional_details:
Rules preventing free school bus travel.

Councils are working to legislation set out in 1940's and it has not been looked at since - times have changed - roads are much busier, plus our government encourage both parents to work but we are now penalised and discriminated against as working parents.

If claiming income support the 3 mile rule drops to 2 mile, but council cannot answer why.
Is it about child safety or saving money due to council cut backs.

Please sign this petition if you feel you have been discriminated against or have issues with not being allocated free school transport and thus putting your child at risk.  Your support is vital.
